tests.name: simple GET
tests.input:
GET /hello HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
tests.expected:
GET /hello HTTP/1.1
host: example.com

tests.name: GET with path and query string
tests.input:
GET /search?q=test&page=1 HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
tests.expected:
GET /search?q=test&page=1 HTTP/1.1
host: example.com

tests.name: POST with Content-Length body
tests.input:
POST /submit HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 13

{"key":"val"}
tests.expected:
POST /submit HTTP/1.1
content-type: application/json
host: example.com

{"key":"val"}

tests.name: headers sorted alphabetically
tests.input:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Zoo: last
Accept: text/html
Host: example.com
tests.expected:
GET / HTTP/1.1
accept: text/html
host: example.com
zoo: last

tests.name: header values trimmed
tests.input:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host:   example.com  
Accept:  text/html
tests.expected:
GET / HTTP/1.1
accept: text/html
host: example.com

tests.name: duplicate headers combined
tests.input:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Accept: text/html
Accept: application/json
tests.expected:
GET / HTTP/1.1
accept: text/html, application/json
host: example.com

tests.name: case-insensitive header names
tests.input:
GET / HTTP/1.1
HOST: example.com
Content-TYPE: text/plain
tests.expected:
GET / HTTP/1.1
content-type: text/plain
host: example.com

tests.name: PUT with body
tests.input:
PUT /resource/1 HTTP/1.1
Host: api.example.com
Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Length: 11

hello world
tests.expected:
PUT /resource/1 HTTP/1.1
content-type: text/plain
host: api.example.com

hello world

tests.name: DELETE with no body
tests.input:
DELETE /resource/42 HTTP/1.1
Host: api.example.com
Authorization: Bearer token123
tests.expected:
DELETE /resource/42 HTTP/1.1
authorization: Bearer token123
host: api.example.com

tests.name: chunked transfer encoding - simple
tests.input:
POST /data HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Transfer-Encoding: chunked

5
Hello
0
tests.expected:
POST /data HTTP/1.1
host: example.com

Hello

tests.name: chunked transfer encoding - multiple chunks
tests.input:
POST /data HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Transfer-Encoding: chunked

5
Hello
1
 
5
World
0
tests.expected:
POST /data HTTP/1.1
host: example.com

Hello World

tests.name: chunked encoding with hex size
tests.input:
POST /data HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Transfer-Encoding: chunked

a
0123456789
0
tests.expected:
POST /data HTTP/1.1
host: example.com

0123456789

tests.name: Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding excluded from output
tests.input:
POST /submit HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Content-Length: 4
Content-Type: text/plain

test
tests.expected:
POST /submit HTTP/1.1
content-type: text/plain
host: example.com

test

tests.name: empty body with no content headers
tests.input:
HEAD /status HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
tests.expected:
HEAD /status HTTP/1.1
host: example.com

tests.name: POST with empty Content-Length body
tests.input:
POST /empty HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Content-Length: 0
Content-Type: text/plain
tests.expected:
POST /empty HTTP/1.1
content-type: text/plain
host: example.com

tests.name: many headers
tests.input:
GET /page HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Accept: text/html
Accept-Language: en-US
Accept-Encoding: gzip
Connection: keep-alive
User-Agent: TestBot/1.0
Cache-Control: no-cache
tests.expected:
GET /page HTTP/1.1
accept: text/html
accept-encoding: gzip
accept-language: en-US
cache-control: no-cache
connection: keep-alive
host: example.com
user-agent: TestBot/1.0

tests.name: multiline body with Content-Length
tests.input:
POST /submit HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Length: 11

line1
line2
tests.expected:
POST /submit HTTP/1.1
content-type: text/plain
host: example.com

line1
line2

tests.name: chunked encoding with larger body
tests.input:
POST /upload HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Content-Type: text/plain
Transfer-Encoding: chunked

4
Wiki
5
pedia
e
 in chunks, yo
0
tests.expected:
POST /upload HTTP/1.1
content-type: text/plain
host: example.com

Wikipedia in chunks, yo

Host: example.com
Connection: keep-alive

connection: keep-alive
host: example.com
